front.title: Mathematical Mesh Part III: Advanced Cryptographic Services

abstract.t: The Mathematical Mesh ?The Mesh? is an infrastructure that facilitates the exchange of configuration and credential data between multiple user devices and provides end-to-end security. This document describes the advanced encryption services supported by the Mesh. This document is also available online at http://mathmesh.com/Documents/draft-hallambaker-mesh-advanced.html [1] .
